articles.title: US black couple settles lawsuit over 'white-washed' home valuation - BBC
articles.description: The couple's house was valued for nearly half a million dollars more when a white friend posed as the owner.
articles.content:
A US black couple has settled a lawsuit with a real estate appraiser whom they accused of giving their home a low valuation because of their race.
Tenisha Tate-Austin and Paul Austin's house was val… [+2680 chars]
